Hero.title: Reach Your Dream Career in Germany
Hero.subtitle: We are with you on your journey to your career in Germany with our professional team. We support you in diploma equivalency, language training and job search processes.

About.title: About Us
About.description: As GerKey, we provide comprehensive support for you to reach your career goals in Germany. We are with you with our expert team in diploma equivalency, visa processes, language training and job search.
About.reliableProcessDesc: We securely manage all your document and application processes
About.expertTeamDesc: Our team of experienced professionals in their field
About.germanyFocusedDesc: Knowledgeable about current legislation and processes in Germany
About.missionDesc: To minimize the difficulties faced by professionals who want to transition from Turkey to Germany in this process and to help them reach their dream career. We aim to keep our success rate consistently high by offering special solutions to each of our customers.

Services.title: Discover GerKey Services
Services.subtitle: Right Package Selection on the Way to Germany
Services.description: Professional support with you at every step, on the way to your dreams.
Services.cancelAnytime: Cancel anytime • No credit card required
Services.careerSubtitle: Take the First Step for a New Life with GerKey
Services.careerDesc: We offer professional support for your dream career with accommodation, language training and job opportunities.

Testimonials.title: Our References
Testimonials.subtitle: Success Stories
Testimonials.description: Experiences of professionals who started a new life in Germany

ahmet.name: Ahmet Y.
ahmet.content: Thanks to GerKey, I got my dream job in the healthcare sector in Germany. The support they provided throughout the process was excellent!

zeynep.name: Zeynep K.
zeynep.content: Thanks to the GerKey team, my work permit and documents in Germany were completed quickly. They were always with me during this process.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked
FAQ.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Answers to all your questions about your relocation process to Germany

questions.q1: How does the relocation process to Germany work?
questions.a1: The GerKey team guides you through the entire process from document preparation to visa application. We plan all steps professionally.
questions.q2: What does the diploma equivalency service include?
questions.a2: Our diploma equivalency service includes diploma translation, apostille procedures, equivalency application, preparation of required documents and follow-up processes. We guide you throughout the process.
questions.q3: In which sectors do you help us find jobs?
questions.a3: We provide support in finding jobs in healthcare, engineering, IT, education, finance and many other sectors. Our expert team knows the special requirements of each sector and offers you suitable opportunities.
questions.a4: Yes, we also provide support in German language training. Starting with level assessment tests, we offer language courses and private lesson options suitable for your needs.
questions.q5: How do you help in the visa application process?
questions.a5: We provide full support in preparing all necessary documents, making appointments, filling out application forms and following up the process in the visa application process.
questions.a6: We offer flexible payment options. Monthly package payments, one-time payments or installment payment options are available. Please contact us for details.
